parameters.name: JobKey
parameters.description: The key of the file upload task. The key is returned when you call the [CreateUploadFileJob](~~206059~~) or [CreateUploadOSSFileJob](~~206060~~) operation.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The tenant ID.

> To view the tenant ID, move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner of the Data Management (DMS) console. For more information, see [Manage DMS tenants](~~181330~~).
